    Cineworld Brighton Change cinema

    About Brighton

    Cineworld Brighton is an 8 screen cinema located on the seafont close to Brighton Pier. The complex is served by a free car park and a wide range of restaurants in short proximity.

    How do I get there?

    Details

    1
    Cineworld Brighton
    Brighton Marina, Brighton, East Sussex BN2 5UF
    0871 200 2000

    Transport Information

    By train

    Brighton Railway Station is approx 2 miles away from the cinema. Bus 7 runs every 15 mins from the train station to the Marina at peak times

    By bus

    Numbers 7 & 12 from the town centre stop near the cinema.

    By car

    Head down A23 to seafront, turn left and follow tourist signs to Brighton Marina. The cinema is 1 mile east of Brighton Pier.

    Parking

    Free multi storey car park is available nearby the cinema.

    Disabled Access

    Disabled Parking

    Designated spaces for disabled parking are available on the lowest floor near the Asda garage

    Hire Cineworld Brighton

    Cineworld Brighton's experienced events team can provide a variety of additional audio, visual and lighting to suit all your requirements, and with flexible space at the front of our auditoria we can accommodate a variety of different staging setups.

    Our professional caterers can provide anything from pastries on arrival to a full hot buffet, and we can offer fantastic corporate deals on refreshments.
